title: Help!
author: Pepina Pippilotta Colada
content: I've been living here for years. And yes, my owner lives here too. And now I have to complain! She sits in front of this strange box all the time, typing away on it and not wanting to be disturbed. But I'm hungry, I desperately need some cuddles, and she should be playing with me. This isn't right! I'm going to call animal welfare. Such disrespectful behavior will not be tolerated here!
